titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2641) making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-190, by Ms. Matsui.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2641 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 76.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 481.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/19/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2641 (Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008).
